abstract: Google and Pacific Gas & Electric have unveiled their vision of a future in which cars and trucks are partly powered by the country’s electric grids, and vice versa.
snippet: Google and Pacific Gas & Electric have unveiled their vision of a future in which cars and trucks are partly powered by the country’s electric grids, and vice versa.
lead_paragraph: MOUNTAIN VIEW, Calif., June 18 — Google and Pacific Gas & Electric have unveiled their vision of a future in which cars and trucks are partly powered by the country’s electric grids, and vice versa.

headline.main: Google and Utility to Test Hybrids That Sell Back Power
headline.print_headline: Google and Utility to Test Hybrids That Sell Back Power

byline.original: By Felicity Barringer and Matthew L. Wald

abstract: Google and Pacific Gas & Electric have introduced their vision of a future in which cars and trucks are partly powered by the country’s electric grids, and vice versa.
lead_paragraph: Google and Pacific Gas & Electric have introduced their vision of a future in which cars and trucks are partly powered by the country’s electric grids, and vice versa.

headline.main: Google Foundation to Invest in Give-and-Take Hybrid
